summary: A comprehensive test suite for the TensorFlow Speech2Text model that validates configuration, forward signatures, attention and hidden state outputs, generation capabilities (including fp16 and beam search), embedding resizing, training behavior, gradient checkpointing options, and equivalence with the PyTorch implementation.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, correctness, and performance of the TensorFlow Speech2Text model for production speech‑to‑text applications, ensuring compatibility with other frameworks and support for advanced training and inference features.
